entry.title: The Second Mr Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: HagiaSophia

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,201Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: A naive young reporter is whisked off his feet when he meets a handsome but grieving billionaire when they meet when working in Europe. Making their new life together in Gotham, he starts to regret his hasty decision as events lead him to believe his husband is hiding a dark secret. A SuperBat re working of “Rebecca” with a very different twist and ending. This work is finished and I’ll be uploading chapters over the next couple of weeks,

entry.title: The Doorway
entry.summary:
Author: GothamiteEditor

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,865Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 1,373

Summary: Peter should really learn not to let his curiosity or desire to prove he's worthy to be Spider-Man make decisions for him.Or.Peter Parker ends up in the Watch Tower, humiliates himself in front of a dude named Superman (no hyphen) and then is stranded with no way home. All because he couldn't not touch a magic door.Captain Marvel doesn't want the world to explode because someone touched a magical door.Superman just wanted to have non-ruined shoes.Batman is trying very hard not to adopt a child he can't keep.Formerly known as “Why You Shouldn’t Mess with Magic Doors”

entry.title: Peter and The Gang™ in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: MichaelWitha_B

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,460Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 68

Summary: Spider-Man and a couple of his close friends have been looking for a very annoying villain. A very villainous villain. The evilest of evil... You get the point. Well, said villain has this crazy tool that well... kills them. All of them. Even villain guy. BUT luckily, said mysterious tool somehow transports them to *drum roll* GOTHAM CITY. YAHOO!!! No cheers? Well I'm cheering anyway *pinky finger flips you off*Simply put, it's my own twist to the Peter in Gotham fics that includes SpideyPool and a couple of my fav boys (and gals).

entry.title: I'm not a great romancer, but im bound to answer when you propose
entry.summary:
Author: Perrythequeerplatypus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,603Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Kryptonians didn't all actually die, turns out some of the council got away thanks to Jor-el's warning, leaving most of the population to die with the planet. Years later, while trying to gather kryptonite for a study they stumbled upon superman and decided to bring him back with them. He was supposed to come alone, but his annoyingly clingy human (fake) husband wouldn't let them leave without him too. Now Clark and Bruce need to figure out how to get home while Clark grapples with the fact that the only thing left from his planet is a colonizing and destructive force.(title is liable to change, because it does not match the vibe i'm going for lol, it's from Anything goes.)

entry.title: Interviewing Superman: A Bruce Wayne Exclusive
entry.summary:
Author: Samitus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,763Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 479

Summary: Bruce Wayne wore many hats: CEO by day, playboy by night, Batman when needed, and full-time father.But with Batman on an unexpected break, Bruce finds himself stepping into the role of journalist when Superman requests exclusive interviews to earn the Dark Knight’s trust. After all, who better than Bruce—allegedly Batman's 'sugar daddy'—to introduce him to Dark Knight ?With his detective instincts kicking in, Bruce sees an opportunity to uncover Superman’s weaknesses. But interviewing an alien who seems to like everyone but him turns out to be his toughest challenge yet.

entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,191Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: Calm down, Smallville!
entry.summary:
Author: Cohrareads

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,911Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 49

Summary: “Why do I get the feeling you’re not quite ready for this to be over?” Clark asked, his tone playful yet hopeful. Bruce met his gaze, a slow smile spreading across his face.“You know me well,” Bruce replied, his voice laced with affection. “How about you come back to the manor with me? We can continue this little adventure.”Clark hesitated only a moment, his heart soaring at the invitation. He couldn’t deny how much he wanted to accept, to see where the night would take them. But he didn’t want to appear too eager. He tried to play it cool, though his expression betrayed his excitement. “What about my busy schedule?” he teased. “Big plans and all that?”Bruce chuckled, leaning forward with a captivating intensity. “Oh, I think I can convince you. I’ll make sure you get back to Metropolis in one piece.”

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,306Chapters: 2/65Kudos: 51

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.

entry.title: Dream a little dream of me
entry.summary:
Author: Doralice

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,965Chapters: 19/20Kudos: 910

Summary: Clark came back from death, but he's not the same anymore. A longing is devouring him from inside and he doesn't know how to end it. He doesn't know he cannot end it. There's only one person who have such power.Or: the one where being able to defeating Clark triggered a mate imprinting into the kryptionian biology, thus Clark is now hopelessly horny for Bruce. As for Bruce, he's hopelessly horny for Clark just because, well, you need to have a reason to thirst over Superman?

entry.title: [PODFIC] eye in the sky

Author: emblepods (emblebeee)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 83Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Original Summary The Justice League went dark ten years ago. The only thing that remains is the Regime. Batman, stripped of his cowl and suit, has been imprisoned on the Watchtower since the JL dissolved, forced to train the Regime’s younger superheroes. The leverage keeping him compliant? His own kids are part of the Regime’s program. Podfic of eye in the sky by TheResurrectionistLength: TBD (est. 5hrs)

entry.title: Oooo you wanna kiss me so bad
entry.summary:
Author: iMiss2012fandomVibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,679Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 63

Summary: “You’re not healing,” Bruce stressed.“I am," said Clark, "it’s just the kryptonite in my bloodstream. When I get back up into the sun it’ll heal faster. I’m still feeling weak and probably can’t fly yet, but I already feel tons better… Thank you."Bruce didn’t respond. He looked at him skeptically before putting his hand over Clark’s, pinning it down to the table.“Push up on my hand.”Sexual tension while stitching up wounds trope. The Kryptonite is a metaphor.
